summary: A semi-lore-friendly 2h sword with lots of shiny
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a falchion style sword heavily inspired by Witcher 2, you can find it in Riverwood outside Sleeping Giant Inn. To install, extract the archive to /Skyrim/Data folder. You can use or abuse it any way you like, no credit or permission is required. Have fun!
Thanks to UnknowMan317 for making an .esp for the mod!
author: j_kolosovskis
